movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest tests.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of four mobsters, two hit men, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team to defend the world.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion prince Simba flees his kingdom after the death of his father, only to discover the truth about his past and reclaim his throne.

movies.title: Frozen
movies.description: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally freezes her kingdom, Anna sets out to find her and break the spell.

movies.title: The Notebook
movies.description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

movies.title: Pride and Prejudice
movies.description: Sparks fly when strong-willed Elizabeth Bennet meets proud Mr. Darcy in this romantic adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel.

movies.title: The Conjuring
movies.description: Paranormal investigators work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

movies.title: The Ring
movies.description: A journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape that kills whoever watches it within seven days.

movies.title: Jaws
movies.description: When a giant great white shark begins hunting people off the coast of a beach town, three men set out to stop it.

movies.title: The Sixth Sense
movies.description: A young boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disgraced child psychologist to deal with his ability.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: In Gotham City, a failed comedian turns to a life of crime and chaos when society rejects him.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: A promising jazz drummer is pushed to his limits by his abusive instructor.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams.

movies.title: The Great Gatsby
movies.description: A mysterious millionaire throws lavish parties and pursues a married woman, with tragic consequences.

movies.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
movies.description: A young woman becomes the toast of New York City with her carefree lifestyle and charm.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.description: In unoccupied Africa during WWII, an American expatriate encounters his lost love, forcing him to make a difficult choice.

movies.title: Citizen Kane
movies.description: Following the death of a media mogul, reporters investigate his final word: 'Rosebud.'

movies.title: Vertigo
movies.description: A detective with a fear of heights becomes obsessed with a mysterious woman in this psychological thriller.

movies.title: Psycho
movies.description: A woman on the run checks into a motel where she encounters the disturbed proprietor and his sinister mother.

movies.title: Rear Window
movies.description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

movies.title: North by Northwest
movies.description: An innocent man is mistaken for a spy and must go on the run while evading both spies and assassins.

movies.title: Singin' in the Rain
movies.description: A performer helps a new starlet navigate the transition from silent to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

movies.title: West Side Story
movies.description: Two teenagers from rival gangs fall in love in this modern retelling of Romeo and Juliet.

movies.title: The Sound of Music
movies.description: A spirited nun becomes a tutor to a large family and helps them escape Nazi Austria with her music and love.

movies.title: Gone with the Wind
movies.description: A strong-willed Southern woman navigates love and loss during the American Civil War.

movies.title: It's a Wonderful Life
movies.description: An angel shows a suicidal man what life would have been like had he never been born.

movies.title: The Wizard of Oz
movies.description: A Kansas girl swept away by a tornado travels through a magical land to find her way home.

movies.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
movies.description: A princess fleeing her evil stepmother finds refuge with seven dwarfs in the forest.

movies.title: Cinderella
movies.description: A mistreated girl gets her chance at a better life with the help of her fairy godmother.

movies.title: Beauty and the Beast
movies.description: A young woman falls in love with a cursed prince and breaks his spell through her compassion.

movies.title: Aladdin
movies.description: A street urchin uses a magical lamp to win the heart of a princess.

movies.title: The Little Mermaid
movies.description: A mermaid princess makes a deal to become human and win the heart of a prince.

movies.title: Moana
movies.description: A strong-willed girl sets out on a daring ocean voyage to save her people.

movies.title: Coco
movies.description: A young boy enters the Land of the Dead to uncover his family's musical heritage.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.description: A cowboy doll and a space ranger toy must work together to reunite with their owner.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.description: A clownfish searches the ocean for his captured son with the help of an amnesiac companion.

movies.title: Inside Out
movies.description: Emotions inside a girl's mind guide her through her family's move to a new city.

movies.title: The Incredibles
movies.description: A superhero family comes out of retirement to save the world from a vengeful villain.

movies.title: Shrek
movies.description: An ogre rescues a princess to win back his swamp, but finds true love in the process.

movies.title: How to Train Your Dragon
movies.description: A young Viking must train a dangerous dragon to save his village.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.description: A girl enters a magical bathhouse and must find her way home while rescuing her parents.

movies.title: Howl's Moving Castle
movies.description: A young woman cursed to live as an elderly woman seeks refuge in a magical castle.

movies.title: Castle in the Sky
movies.description: A boy and girl search for a legendary floating castle in the sky.

movies.title: Princess Mononoke
movies.description: A young prince must stop a war between humans and the gods of the forest.

movies.title: Up
movies.description: An elderly widower and a young boy embark on an adventure to Paradise Falls.

movies.title: Ratatouille
movies.description: A rat with a passion for cooking forms an alliance with a human to run a Parisian restaurant.

movies.title: Cars
movies.description: A hotshot race car must learn the value of friendship and family in a small town.

movies.title: Monsters, Inc.
movies.description: Two monsters must protect a human child from a sinister conspiracy in their world.

movies.title: A Bug's Life
movies.description: An inventive ant leads a colony in a revolt against oppressive grasshoppers.

movies.title: Zootopia
movies.description: A rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must solve a missing animal case.

movies.title: Big Hero 6
movies.description: A tech prodigy and his inflatable robot companion must stop a masked villain.

movies.title: Tangled
movies.description: A princess with magical hair escapes her tower to discover her true identity.

movies.title: Wreck-It Ralph
movies.description: A video game villain tries to become a hero by entering other arcade games.

movies.title: Kung Fu Panda
movies.description: A clumsy panda must become a martial arts master to save his valley.

movies.title: Madagascar
movies.description: Zoo animals escape and find themselves stranded in Madagascar.

movies.title: Ice Age
movies.description: Prehistoric animals must journey across an icy landscape to return a human baby to his tribe.

movies.title: Finding Dory
movies.description: A forgetful fish embarks on a quest to find her family with help from her friends.

movies.title: Happy Feet
movies.description: A penguin who can dance must find his place in an emperor penguin colony.

movies.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
movies.description: An inventor creates a weather machine that rains food, causing chaos in a small town.

movies.title: The Lego Movie
movies.description: An ordinary lego figure is mistaken for a prophesied hero who can save the lego universe.

movies.title: Toy Story 3
movies.description: Woody and his toy friends must escape from a daycare and rescue mission.

movies.title: Toy Story 4
movies.description: Woody embarks on a road trip and must help a lost toy find her owner.

movies.title: Incredibles 2
movies.description: The superhero family faces new threats while the mom takes on hero duty.

movies.title: Coco 2
movies.description: Miguel returns to the Land of the Dead to uncover more family secrets.

movies.title: Encanto
movies.description: A girl without magic must save her magical family and their enchanted house.

movies.title: Turning Red
movies.description: A girl discovers she can transform into a giant red panda when emotional.

movies.title: Soul
movies.description: A jazz musician gets separated from his soul before his big performance.

movies.description: A sea monster boy must hide his true form while befriending a human girl.

movies.title: Raya and the Last Dragon
movies.description: A warrior and the last dragon must save their world from dark forces.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
movies.description: A young wizard discovers his magical heritage and begins his training at Hogwarts.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
movies.description: Harry must uncover the mystery of a secret chamber and the creature within it.

movies.title: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A hobbit must destroy a powerful ring by journeying to Mount Doom with his fellowship.

movies.title: Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.description: The fellowship is broken as two hobbits continue their quest while others fight in a war.

movies.title: Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.description: The final battle for Middle-earth ensues as Frodo attempts to destroy the One Ring.

movies.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
movies.description: A hobbit embarks on an unexpected adventure with dwarves to reclaim their treasure.

movies.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
movies.description: Children discover a magical world through a wardrobe and must help a lion defeat the White Witch.

movies.title: Percy Jackson & The Olympians: The Lightning Thief
movies.description: A young boy discovers he is the son of a Greek god and must save the world.

movies.title: The Hunger Games
movies.description: A girl volunteers to participate in a televised death match to save her sister.

movies.title: Divergent
movies.description: A teenager discovers she is divergent in a dystopian society divided by factions.

movies.title: The Maze Runner
movies.description: Teenagers wake up in a mysterious maze with no memory of how they got there.

movies.title: Ready Player One
movies.description: A teenager enters a virtual reality game world to find a hidden fortune and win a prize.

movies.title: Ender's Game
movies.description: A brilliant young boy is trained at a military school to command a fleet against aliens.

movies.title: Dune
movies.description: A young man must navigate a dangerous desert planet while uncovering his mysterious destiny.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049
movies.description: A blade runner investigates a case that could plunge the world into chaos.

movies.title: Ex Machina
movies.description: A programmer is invited to administer a Turing test on a humanoid artificial intelligence.

movies.title: Arrival
movies.description: A linguist must communicate with aliens to prevent a global war.

movies.title: The Martian
movies.description: An astronaut must survive on Mars until rescue while using his ingenuity and science knowledge.

movies.title: Gravity
movies.description: An astronaut must survive after debris destroys her spaceship in orbit.
